attributes.action: act promptly to secure the release of Samantha Orobator
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Samantha Orobator is currently being held in a Laos prison, and is set to be executed. She has not been given access to a lawyer, and there are reports of torture. She has fallen pregnant whilst she has been in prison. 

It is axiomatic that the rule of law is non-existent in Laos, and that they have breached international laws in relation to torture and foreign prisoners. 

I ask the PM and those within the Foreign Office to act judiciously and promptly in assisting her and her family.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
